description.narrative: Lagos is the largest city in Africa with 21 million inhabitants and still growing. The size of the population in the city has brought about great challenges, but also great opportunities with regards to the circular economy. One of the major circular challenges that the city is facing currently is waste management (or the lack of it). Out of this enormous waste management challenge also many opportunities have arisen, like with many other challenges that result from the vast increase in the city’s demand for resources and services (like water, energy, habitation, transportation infrastructure, healthcare, schools, etc.). Thus, circular economy and waste management have become hot topics in the city Lagos. There are currently many initiatives being implemented in Nigeria on circular economy and waste management, but many of them are done so in isolation. Many potentially interested partners and stakeholder do not know about the initiatives of others. Subsequently, initiatives are potentially less impactful, investment opportunities are being missed and there is no systemic approach. To accurately address the circular challenges the country and the city of Lagos face, there is a growing need for a different approach. The broader aim of this project is to support Lagos in its transition to a circular economy through establishing a Circular Business Platform (CBP), facilitating cooperation, coordination and networking between businesses, government, knowledge institutions and civil society organisations involved in the circular economy. In addition the CBP will also have an agenda-setting role for a more coordinated and a demand driven approach towards a circular economy in Lagos that drives entrepreneurship. In this project a preparatory research is carried to collect information on the business model and inform and inspire relevant stakeholders regarding the establishment of this CBP in Lagos, which will have to be managed by an independent hosting organisation.

receiver-org.narrative: Parkeer (hier mogen alle foutieve aanvragen aan gekoppeld)
Parkeer (hier mogen alle foutieve aanvragen aan gekoppeld)
